TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeEntryPointMethod extends System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod

Docs.summary: Represents the entry point method of an executable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A CodeEntryPointMethod is a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod> that represents the entry point method of an executable.
## Examples This example demonstrates using a CodeEntryPointMethod to indicate the method to start program execution at.
[!code-cpp[CodeEntryPointMethod#2](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.codedom.codeent_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CodeEntryPointMethod#2](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.codedom.codeent_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CodeEntryPointMethod#2](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.codedom.codeent_1.vb)]
